verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H8067>Sheminith,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H3467>Help,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the godly <S%H2623>man<s%> <S%H1584>ceaseth;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H6461>fail<s%> from among the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>

They <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor:<s%> with <S%H2513>flattering<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> and with a double <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3820><s%> do they <S%H1696>speak.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2513>flattering<s%> <S%H8193>lips,<s%> and the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> that <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> proud things: <S%H1419><s%>
Who <S%H834><s%> have <S%H559>said,<s%> With our <S%H3956>tongue<s%> will we <S%H1396>prevail;<s%> our <S%H8193>lips<s%> are our own: <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H113>lord<s%> over us?

For the <S%H4480>oppression<s%> <S%H7701><s%> of the <S%H6041>poor,<s%> for the <S%H4480>sighing<s%> <S%H603><s%> of the <S%H34>needy,<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> will I <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> I will <S%H7896>set<s%> him in <S%H3468>safety<s%> from him that <S%H6315>puffeth<s%> at him.

The <S%H565>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> are <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H565>words:<s%> as <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H6884>tried<s%> in a <S%H5948>furnace<s%> of <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H2212>purified<s%> <S%H7659>seven<s%> times.
Thou <S%H859><s%> shalt <S%H8104>keep<s%> them, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> thou shalt <S%H5341>preserve<s%> them <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H2098>this<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> on every <S%H5439>side,<s%> when the <S%H2149>vilest<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> are <S%H7311>exalted.<s%>
